title: HOW TO SELL BOOKS WITH PUBLISHER ROCKET: DEMO
description:
Learn how to sell books with Publisher Rocket in this video. Publisher Rocket (formerly called KDP Rocket), is a great piece of software to help you pick better keywords and categories to sell more books on Amazon. Get the scoop in this full on screen demo. Keep on scribbling. Enjoy!

Also helpful:
